query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `artist_microloans` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `artistProfileId` int NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `requestedAmount` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL,
  `approvedAmount` decimal(10,2),
  `originationFee` decimal(10,2),
  `totalOwed` decimal(10,2),
  `totalRepaid` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  `purpose` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `purposeDescription` text,
  `status` enum('pending','approved','active','repaid','defaulted','rejected') DEFAULT 'pending',
  `repaymentRate` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT 15.00,
  `monthlyEarningsAtApproval` decimal(10,2),
  `approvedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `rejectedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `rejectionReason` text,
  `completedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2SKEMaxYovcAzrR.root --database nTbKjjzazhRpeJn9kKuXdQ --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `artist_microloans` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `artistProfileId` int NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `requestedAmount` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL,
  `approvedAmount` decimal(10,2),
  `originationFee` decimal(10,2),
  `totalOwed` decimal(10,2),
  `totalRepaid` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  `purpose` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `purposeDescription` text,
  `status` enum('pending','approved','active','repaid','defaulted','rejected') DEFAULT 'pending',
  `repaymentRate` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT 15.00,
  `monthlyEarningsAtApproval` decimal(10,2),
  `approvedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `rejectedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `rejectionReason` text,
  `completedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
